greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 6: repeat [0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1].
comment: a(n) is 0 if 6 divides n, 1 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..26244
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,1).
formula: Recurrence: a(n+6) = a(n), a(0) = 0, a(i) = 1, 1 <= i <= 5.
For the general case: the characteristic function of numbers that are not multiples of m is a(n) = floor((n-1)/m) - floor(n/m) + 1, m, n > 0. - _Boris Putievskiy_, May 08 2013
a(n) = sign(n mod 6). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 29 2013
a(n) = ceiling(5n/6) - floor(5n/6). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 20 2014
maple: seq(signum(k mod 6), k=0..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 29 2013
program: (MAGMA) [Sign(n mod 6) : n in [0..50]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 20 2014
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Aug 16 2004
ext: New name from _Omar E. Pol_, Oct 21 2013
